name: Suspicious Plink Usage RDP Tunneling
description: Execution of well known tools for data exfiltration and tunneling
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Pp][Ll][Ii][Nn][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\:127\.0\.0\.1\:3389.*/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Pp][Ll][Ii][Nn][Kk]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\:3389.*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Pp]\ 443.*/ OR /.*\ \-[Pp]\ 22.*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\plink.exe AND process.command_line:*\:127.0.0.1\:3389*) OR (process.executable:*\\plink.exe AND process.command_line:*\:3389* AND process.command_line:(*\ \-P\ 443* OR *\ \-P\ 22*)))`
